mapper.update: update apply_table set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, association_id = #{associationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_id,u.name, a.association_id,assn.association_name, a.department_id,d.department_name, a.content, a.apply_time, a.`state` from apply_table a left join user_table u on u.id = a.user_id left join association_table assn on assn.id = a.association_id left join department_table d on d.id = a.department_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
